meanings.definition: The act of descending or moving downward.
meanings.sent1: The descension of the elevator was smooth and steady.
meanings.sent2: The hikers carefully navigated the steep descension of the mountain.
meanings.sent3: The descension of the balloon made the children giggle with delight.
meanings.sent4: Her descension into the depths of despair was gradual but inevitable.
meanings.sent5: The descension of the sun below the horizon painted the sky in vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: The descension of the road made it challenging for the cyclists.
meanings.sent2: The skiers enjoyed the thrill of descending the steep descension.
meanings.sent3: The descension of the playground slide was a favorite among the children.
meanings.sent4: The descension of the riverbank led to a hidden cove.
meanings.sent5: The descension of the roller coaster elicited screams of excitement.

meanings.definition: The act of coming down from a higher position or level.
meanings.sent1: The descension of the airplane signaled the end of their journey.
meanings.sent2: The descension of the ladder was carefully monitored by the workers.
meanings.sent3: The descension of the price made the shoppers eager to buy.
meanings.sent4: Her descension from stardom was met with mixed emotions.
meanings.sent5: The descension of the temperature marked the onset of winter.
